column5: Netflix and video games available for your entertainment! Bedding and pillows are limited so please bring your own if possible. Central air, kitchen, & shared bathroom! Smoking area and fridge on the patio. Self-cleanup. If you want to play a particular console / game check with me ahead of time and if I have it I'll hook it up for you and have the game ready if its in my collection. Last minute arrivals might be on your own. Slide games you borrow in to room 1 when done.
column8: Crash on Comfortable Leather Couch Near 90 / 410
